# TagsMusicConverter
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/With%20tools%20we%20build%20the%20best%20tools-blue?style=flat-square&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%2CPD94bWwgdmVyc2lvbj0iMS4wIiBlbmNvZGluZz0iaXNvLTg4NTktMSI%%2BDQo8cG9seWdvbiBzdHlsZT0iZmlsbDojRDk0NDUyOyIgcG9pbnRzPSIzMDAuMjEsMzAyLjI0MSAyNzcuNTg3LDMyNC44NjYgMTg3LjEyOCwyMzQuMzkxIDIwOS43NTIsMjExLjc2NyAyNjIuNTI0LDIxOS4zMDUgDQoJMjkyLjY4LDI0OS40NjEgIi8%%%2BDQo8L2c%2BDQo8cG9seWdvbiBzdHlsZT0iZmlsbDojRTZFOUVEOyIgcG9pbnRzPSIyNDcuNDM4LDI5NC43MSA5OC4wNzUsNDQ0LjA2NSA4Mi45OTcsNDc0LjIyIDMwLjIxOCw1MTEuOTIzIDAuMDYyLDQ4MS43NjYgMzcuNzY0LDQyOC45ODcgDQoJNjcuOTIsNDEzLjkwOSAyMTcuMjgzLDI2NC41NDYgIi8%%%2BDQoJPHBhdGggc3R5bGU9ImZpbGw6I0Q5NDQ1MjsiIGQ9Ik0yNzAuMDYzLDE2Ni41MzRMNDAzLjIzOCwzMy4zNDJjNC4xNzItNC4xNjQsNC4xNzItMTAuOTA2LDAtMTUuMDc4bC0xNDguMjUzLDE0OC4yNw0KCQlDMjU5LjE0OSwxNzAuNjk4LDI2NS44OTksMTcwLjY5OCwyNzAuMDYzLDE2Ni41MzR6Ii8%%3D%3D)

Convert your wma files to mp3 with ID3 tags. / 转换带有歌曲信息的wma文件到mp3。

# Usage / 使用方法

1. Download the latest Release from [here]().  
从[这里]()下载最新的Release。
2. Run in command line:  
在命令行中运行：
```bash
.\TagsMusicConverter.exe [-h] [-d] input_path [output_path]
```
The program will traverse all the files in the input path, if `output_path` is not specified, 
the output will be in the same directory as the input file.  
程序会遍历输入路径下的所有文件，如果没有指定`output_path`，输出文件将在输入文件所在的目录下。  


If `output_path` is specified, the output files will be arranged in the same folder structure as the input files.  
如果指定了`output_path`，输出文件将按照原有输入文件夹的结构排列。

`-d` option will delete the input file after conversion.  
`-d`选项会在转换完成后删除输入文件。

## Supported ID3 tags / 支持的ID3标签
- title / 歌曲名
- artist / 艺术家
- album / 专辑
- genre / 流派
- tracknumber / 音轨号
- composer / 作曲家
- albumartist / 专辑艺术家
- date / 日期

## Development / 开发
Make sure you have installed [poetry](https://python-poetry.org/).  
确保你已经安装了[poetry](https://python-poetry.org/)。
```bash
poetry install
# Run
python main.py [-h] [-d] input_path [output_path]
# Build
poetry run pyinstaller main.py -F -n TagsMusicConverter
```
